component.name: Digger
component.summary: Modern DNS lookup tool with a graphical interface

description.p: Digger is a modern DNS lookup tool that provides a user-friendly graphical interface for the dig command. It simplifies DNS queries by presenting the results in a structured and easily understandable format.

ul.li: Support for all common DNS record types (A, AAAA, MX, TXT, NS, CNAME, SOA)
Structured results display with answer, authority, and additional sections
Responsive interface with background query processing
Modern GTK4 and LibAdwaita design following GNOME HIG
Built-in error handling for network issues and invalid domains

description.p: Perfect for network administrators, developers, and anyone who needs to troubleshoot DNS issues or explore domain configurations.

screenshot.caption: Main application window showing DNS query interface in both dark and light themes

description.p: Self-contained DNS lookup tool with bundled dig command.

ul.li: Self-contained dig command bundled within Flatpak (BIND 9.16.48)
Eliminated dependency on host system DNS tools
Fixed DNS connectivity issues in sandboxed environments
Better crypto compatibility in restricted environments
Enhanced Flatpak manifest with proper network permissions

description.p: Initial release of Digger DNS lookup tool.
